attributes.action: Stop the ban on xl bullies and start banning the breeders.
attributes.additional_details: The government should ban breeding and the irresponsible owners from owning such a strong breed. The dogs and animals are not the problem. it is the owners fault for not training correctly or not researching the genetics of the dogs. You should not ban the dog when all the xl I know are softer then a teddy bear
attributes.background: NOT TO BAN THE XL BREED WHEN THE PROBLEM ARE THE OWNERS AND BREEDERS

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar actions:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
